title: Non-blocking interrupt sends silently drop guardrail violations
description:
## Location
- internal/orchestrator/orchestrator.go:493
- internal/loop/loop.go:343

## Problem
select { case ch <- msg: default: } silently drops interrupts if channel is full (capacity 1). Guardrail violations can be ignored entirely with no logging or error.

## Fix
Use unbounded queue or increase buffer + log drops.
